mapper.update: update pr_serv_spcode_hist set profile_id = #{profileId}, co_id = #{coId}, sncode = #{sncode}, histno = #{histno}, spcode = #{spcode}, transactionno = #{transactionno}, valid_from_date = #{validFromDate}, entry_date = #{entryDate}, request_id = #{requestId}, rec_version = #{recVersion} where profile_id = #{profileId};
